title: Building Web and Mobile Applications
intro: Since 2017, Henri has been creating custom Web experiences for meaningful projects.
ingeneerBody:
I'm graduated from Telecom ParisTech, the best french engineering school in the digital field.

I specialized in Entrepreneurship for the multidisciplinary aspect of working in startups.

I like to hold both sides, Communication and Craftmanship!
expertBody:
I have been working as a Web Developer since 2017.

I have focused on Front with the most popular framework: React.js.

I am able to provide reliable and scalable Web and Mobile applications that are fully customizable.
freelanceBody:
After 3 years of learning in several companies, I am now able to work as a freelancer.

That allows me to answer the need of Flexibility for many clients.

Therefore, I can progress more and experiment the Digital Nomad lifestyle.
particularTitle: Add a Website to your Business üëÅÔ∏è
particularBody:
You want to start a business and you need Online Visibility ?

You have an existing business but you need a new website?

You want a personal showcase or portfolio for Self Advertising ?

And finally, you prefer to Work with a Human rather than a CMS platform like Wordpress or Wix?

Search no more! I can help you to create and publish your website.
particularAlt: A responsive website on desktop and mobile
companyTitle: Get Help on an Existing Project ‚öôÔ∏è
companyBody:
You have an existing Web or Mobile Application, maybe with some Backend intelligence?

I am a graduate from T√©l√©com ParisTech, best french engineer school in the Web field.

Since 2017, I'be been working on several web applications, mainly around the React javascript framework.

If your project has a positive social or environmental impact, I'll be happy to be a part of it!
startupTitle: You have an Idea to make the world a better place üåû
startupBody:
You think you found a society's need that can be fulfilled?

You think you can disrupt an existing market with a process shortcut?

Or you want to launch a project concerning social justice, environment or health ?

Then I'll be happy to be a part of it! I think I'll be able to give an advice on the technical feasability of your project.
